summary: This mod extremely enhances your prison game play by adding trapdoors, stairways, new keys, and a totally new and exciting way to escape prison!
descriptionHtml:
This mod extremely enhances your prison game play by adding trapdoors, stairways, new keys, and a totally new and exciting way to escape prison!

This is early release (Only the Whiterun Jail is finished.) But please subscribe and give me feedback, which will effect ALL of the other hold jails in the rest of the mod

And besides, it'll be finished in no time since making this mod is very interesting and fun. =D

Please subscribe, rate AND comment, also if you like it, favorite it so your friends can see it. (=
author: mpuckett
